about_the_game:
A Hard Core, Turn Based, Hex & Chit Wargame. 2D like a boardgame.

A.I. ,A detailed Editor, and Hotseat options, you can set A.I. advantages etc... . You can add Rail Networks to any game. Live database to find targets. Battle Report shows the game info and you can reset game objectives to fight for, it also shows last turn info.

A complex Combat system, allowing you to select who fights in the battle, you can also choose type of attack EG you can do an infantry only attack if your ahead in men, or a missile only attack if attacking with ART or AIR units . the game uses movement costs so travelling by rail is quicker. there is a random map generator and 3 main maps. the games can be randomly setup or play a scenario, adding rail networks will change a game scenario.
